pages.text: Endermen are tall, black neutral mobs from the End that have the ability to teleport, and pick up blocks.

pages.name: Enderman
pages.text: Endermen spawn naturally throughout the entire dimension.

pages.title: Behavoir
pages.text: Endermen do not attack unless provoked by a player or mob attacking them, or by a player looking them in the eyes from up to 64 blocks away.
